title: Introducing FAST™ PLM
summary: Speed, value, accuracy, and iteration are the core mission themes applied through our software consulting services to guard against software waste. Read through each section to see how we can save you money.

content.value: A bird's eye-view of our value to you.

content.copy: Recent statistics show that 70% of software projects fail, with $50-150 billion attributed to software waste annually in the U.S.

Our extensive experience has led us to our mission of solving this problem by abstracting much of the major pain points of digital development. Efficiency means better value, and better value means a healthier economy for all.

title: Accelerated Roadmapping
summary: Stop the churn by letting us manage, and guarantee, your entire project. From conception to production, with a focus on UX, our strategy and warranty ensures that you’ll never be a statistic of software waste.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: Guaranteed Accuracy
summary: Stop the churn by letting us manage, and guarantee, your entire project. From conception to production, with a focus on UX, our strategy and warranty ensures that you’ll never be a statistic of software waste.

content.copy: Pairing dedicated hands-on development services with our higher level consulting services bridges the gaps between creative, management, and implementation, fulfilling a role as a full service agency.

title: Maintained Performance
summary: We offer secure at-cost cloud hosting during development, as well as post-project LTS and monitoring for a nominal fee per server per month, managed by our certified industry-leading cloud consultants.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: Velocity™ Plan Pricing
summary: No more nickel-and-diming over hours. We’re bottom-line thinkers who know what projects cost and what motivates staff. Why not make project planning simpler while retaining highly talented and dedicated workers?

title: Point & Pay™ Sprint Pricing
summary: Individual consultants can be retained within your team and activated as needed for a surcharge on each point-based task delivered and verified. Includes up to 10 senior partner hours of consulting per month.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: Wingman™ Surety Coverage
summary: Every development project we manage is insured up to 10% of the total project price to guarantee minimum risk of delivery time, budget, and quality. Valid from kick-off until 120 days after project acceptance.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: 100% Power Every Hour
summary: All of our remote consultants are universally trained in every aspect of digital development and management. Integrating our multi-role experts within your team means more speed and up to 30% less cost for you.

content.value: One of our multi-role experts can do the work of two competing consultants.

content.copy: Universal skill-sets mitigate communication bottlenecks, ensuring zero latency between task objectives and maximum productivity per every hour worked.

All of our consulting agents operate remotely within the domestic U.S. while integrated with your team, providing exemplary written and communication skills along with mastery in their respective trade disciplines, as well as expert training in each crucial role of digital development.
